Html:
I´m making a web applications that extract some records form an Excel file. All works great on my local wamp server and another share hosting server based in CentOS.
For final app is needed to install it on Ubuntu server with PHP 5.5, all works great, but I get the following error when I try to import a file with many records (aprox 4000). If I try with a file with for example 16 records all works fine or if I try in local or share server, this issue is only present on production server:

Notice: Undefined offset: 0 ....../PHPExcel/Reader/Excel5.php on line 4003

There something I can review to try to fix this issue?

PHP version on local and share server is 5.4 and production server is 5.5. I don´t know if we need to use 5.4 to PHPExcel works fine.

Best Regards !!
